OptionPackage.DisplayName: SINAMICS Startdrive G130, G150, S120, S150, SINAMICS MV, S210
SINAMICS Startdrive G110M, G120, G120C, G120D, G120P, G115D

AttributeList.Text: You can manage the maximum time for opening with the variable "Max_Time_OpenClose"
Enable or disable actuator if a short press is detected
Disable actuator after second short press
Enable actuator after first short press
The remaining time > max time is not necessary
If the door is closed and the requested instruction is closing, the instruction is stopped.
Turn on the light to indicate that the door can be used | The information on the door status | Flashes the led if the door is not closed and there is no authorization
Add or subtract time from the remaining time if the door opens or closes
